title: Darning sampler
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on linen foundation
Technique: embroidered in satin, cross, and running stitches (pattern darning) on plain weave foundation
description: Four darning crosses, one with knitting, in the middle crowned monogram.  Four decorative  squares and each numeral of the date in a embroidered square.  Central patch was not removed and reinserted.
name: Darning sampler
